description:
Players take on the role of a young aspiring artist who enrolls in the Pokémon Art Academy to learn how to draw Pokémon under the tutelage of Professor Andy. Through novice lessons they are taught the basics of art, from simple shapes to coloring, and introduced to various tools and techniques they will use to create art.

The basic gameplay allows the player to create illustrations of Pokémon and draw their way through the various lessons at the academy using the Nintendo 3DS Touch Screen. Once they graduate, all of the options within the game are unlocked, including a set of special lessons that include Mega Evolution Pokémon.
name: Pokémon™ Art Academy™
disclaimer:

You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.

Wireless broadband Internet access required for online features. For more info, go to support.nintendo.com.
